Placehold.in

A quick way to display placeholder images during mockups and development using a simple and comprehensive syntax.

http://localhost:8888/ 300x200 @2x .png ?dark
  • Dimensions
  • Device pixel ratio
  • Format
  • Theme

Dimensions

Required. Allowed value for both width and height is a positive integer between 1 and 1600.

Device pixel ratio

Optional with 1 as default. Allowed value is a positive integer between 1 and 5.

Format

Optional with svg as default. Allowed values are false avif , heif , jpeg , jxl , png , svg and webp .

Theme

Optional using the light theme as default. When specified the dark theme is used instead.

∴
